raw_response:
Thought: To check if a number is prime, we can iterate from 2 to the square root of the number and check if any value divides it evenly. If no such divisor is found, the number is prime.

```ruby
def is_prime?(num)
  return false if num <= 1

  (2..Math.sqrt(num).to_i).none? { |i| num % i == 0 }
end

final_answer(answer: is_prime?)
```
